title: Is there a way to backup Android 10 Wifi passwords, and Bluetooth associations?
content:
I want to do a factory reset and would like to be able to preserve all my Wi-Fi network SSID and Password information as well as my Bluetooth Pairings.

is there a method to do this?
Also needed for when a "network" reset is done which does mobile, Wifi and Bluetooth
Thanks for your help
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
